ARABIC: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When you and those with you are settled in the Ship, then say: "Praise be to Allah who has rescued us from the people of the wrongdoers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When you and those with you have boarded the ark, say: 'All praise be to God who has delivered us from the people who were sinful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And then when you and those accompanying you are firmly seated in the Ark, say: "Thanks be to Allah Who has delivered us from the wrong-doing people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When all of you settle in the Ark, say, "Only God Who has saved us from the unjust people deserves all praise".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And when you and those with you have safely boarded the ship say, ‘All praise is to Allah Who has rescued us from the unjust.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when you have embarked on the ship, you and whoever is with you, then say: `All the praise be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who are wrongdoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when you are firmly seated, you and those with you, in the ark, say: All praise is due to Allah who delivered us from the unjust people:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when thou art seated in the Ark and those with thee, say, "Praise belongs to God, who has delivered us from the people of the evildoers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when thou art on board the ship, thou and whoso is with thee, then say: Praise be to Allah Who hath saved us from the wrongdoing folk!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When you and all your followers have settled in the Ark, say, "Praise be to God who has delivered us from a wicked people,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when thou art settled, thou and those with thee, in the ark, say thou: praise unto Allah who hath delivered us from the wrong doing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘When you, and those who are with you, are settled in the ark, say, ‘‘All praise belongs to Allah, who has delivered us from the wrongdoing lot.’’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when thou hast embarked on the Ark - thou and those with thee,- say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who do wrong."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when you have embarked on the ship, you and whoever is with you, then say: "All the praises and thanks be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who are Zalimun (i.e. oppressors, wrong-doers, polytheists, those who join others in worship with Allah, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when you and all those with you are seated in the Ark, say: 'Praise be to Allah who has saved us from the harmdoing nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, when you and those with you are settled in the Ark, say, “Praise be to God, who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:28] And when you have settled, [when] you are balanced, in the Ark together with those with you, say, “Praise be to God Who has delivered us from the wrongdoing folk”, [from] the disbelievers and the destruction that   came upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when thou art on board the ship, thou and whoso is with thee) of the believers, (then say: Praise be to Allah) gratitude is due to Allah (Who hath saved us from the wrong-doing folk!) who has saved us from the disbelievers!
